filmJson.name: Bioscop
filmJson.fact1: This format used two loops of 54mm filmstrips with no side perforations during filming and 4 perforations during projection
filmJson.fact2: This system worked by projecting one frame from each strip of film in rapid succession
filmJson.fact3: Footage from this camera debuted in July 1895 and Skladanowsky was awarded a patent in November 1895
